name: AMS_DB
short_description:
This project aims at providing a convenient way of browsing, updating and enjoying your CandyDollTV-collection.

It features:

    Cross-browser compatible HTML, CSS and JavaScript
    Batch-import of models and sets using XML
    Batch-import of pictures and videos
    Batch-download for images (ZIP)
    Download for videos
    Automatic model-index generator
    Slideshow feature for set's images
    Custom multi-downloader 

It uses:

    XHTML 1.0 Strict
    CSS 2.1
    PHP 5.3.6
    MySQL 5.1
    jQuery 1.7.1
    ColorBox 1.3.19
    PHPMailer 5.2.1 

The actual content (159 GBytes, as of 02-2012) is being referenced on-disk and hence not part of this project.
summary: Web based management system for AMS collections
